    • Method Detail

      • fromByte

        public static java.lang.String fromByte(byte b)
        Returns the byte as a hex string. If b is less than 16 the hex string returned contains a leading zero.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte to be converted
        Returns:
        the hex string.
